channel.title: Timeline on Information on the rail yard for Creekside
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on Information on the rail yard for Creekside

item.title: Interactive version
item.description: A timeline of events leading up to the ROMF/railyard site approval. At each of the time points below, there was no effort by GoTriangle, Durham City, Durham County or Creekside Elementary administration to directly contact or inform parents, guardians or teaching staff at Creekside Elementary.

item.title: Tick Tock
item.description: Date Topic Detail Any direct contact of Creekside parents by the school district? 2010-2012 Site identification Go Triangle Alternatives Analysis identified 5 sites for the ROMF No May-12 Public comment period After four meetings, GoTriangle identified fifth Alston Ave site No 2012 Public comment period Hundreds of comments opposing the Cornwallis Road site proposed for ROMF/rail yard No 2012 Environmental Analysis Process GoTriangle hosted more than 300 meetings with public groups No 8/25/2015 GoTriangle notified Durham Public School District and Creekside administration GoTriangle notified Durham Public School District about proposed ROMF at Farrington Road site.
